Text:
Also, the tracks for Mirror are in WMA format. 
Diorama in MP3.

I'll rarely ever comment on shit but in this case I have to: it's exactly as Lord Frenchy put it.  I'm personally disappointed in myself that I never found who DJ Okawari or Nujabes were before today.
Thanks guys. If I come across something else I think is good that's hard to find, I'll be sure to post it up.
